Create custom filters
to hear or mute tweets

Filter your Twitter timeline for tweets by certain users or any combination of keywords, links, photos, hashtags, or quotes. Always see these tweets, or never see these tweets—you make the rules.

Train wynno
to recognize the tweets you like

You can train wynno to distinguish the tweets you like from those you don't care about, by clicking the and buttons next to tweets. wynno will suggest filters for you to adopt, based on your votes. You can even tell wynno to filter out tweets it predicts you won't like.

Enjoy Twitter more!
because less noise

Spend more time exploring interesting content, and less time sifting through the stuff you don't care about.

Privacy
it's yours

Your activity on wynno is private. No other users can see what tweets you like or dislike, or what tweet filters you use. wynno is not one more social media presence for you to manage.

wynno
[win-oh] Also, winnow.

verb, used with object

1. to free (grain) from the lighter particles of chaff, dirt, etc.

2. to separate or distinguish (valuable from not valuable)
